amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC. __. None of the funds in this Act may be used to enforce permit requirements pursuant to part 14 of title 50, Code of Federal Regulations, with respect to the export of squid, octopus, and cuttlefish products.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 71 printed in House Report 114-683 to limit permit inspection regulations with respect to the export of squid, octopus, and cuttlefish products.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Westerman amendment (A057) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Westerman amendment (A057) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A057) offered by Mr. Westerman.
